title: Nasya Therapy: Ancient Ayurvedic Practice Of Oiling Nasal Passages For Protection Against Airborne Irritants
description: While you can use face mask, air purifier, and do lifestyle changes to reduce the risk of developing serious health problems, Nasya therapy is considered one of the most effective method to clean the upper respiratory passage.
